name: Letter to Santa
description:
Santa Claus has his naughty and nice list, but he still loves getting letters from the kids, to let him know what you are really wanting to unwrap under the Christmas tree on December 25th. This letter is perfect for the kids just starting out with their correspondence with old St. Nick, all they have to do is fill in the blank spaces, maybe draw Santa a little something special, have fun using the stickers to seal the letter and take a trip to the mailbox! What a fun way to spend some time with your kid as the Holidays approach.

The Letter to Santa comes scored so all you have to do is have fun filling in the letter, fold it down and use the awesome stickers to seal the letter. Within Canada & the US, letters to the Jolly Guy are free (um hell yeah!) so no postage necessary, just drop in the post box and wait for his arrival. Don't forget to bake him those cookies, he gets pretty hungry with all that travelling!

If you are from a country outside of North America, just hit the custom button and I can make a special letter for your children. Just let me know what your specific country's address for letters to Santa Claus is!

This listing is for one card 5.5 x 8.5" flat (card is scored + folds down to 5.5" x 4.25"
Printed on a bright white 100lb FSC card stock
set includes 3 stickers to help seal & decorate your letter

name: 1st Wedding Anniversary card
description:
The Traditional gift for a First Wedding Anniversary is paper, so why not give your other half a super fun card, you made it to the paper anniversary :) The countdown of the official days you've been married makes all the more monumental too.

This card comes in 2 colour combos right now, please select which option you'd like in the drop down. If there's an option you are looking for that's not listed, send me a message. This card can be customized.

This listing is for 1 card. 4.5" x 5.5" + white envelope
Printed on beautiful bright white 100lb FSC certified cardstock

name: Get S**i Done notepad
description:
I have lists everywhere to remind me of all the stuff I need to get done on a daily basis. A friend and I used to get together once a month for "Get Shit Done Meetings", and mostly this was so that we had someone to report to once a month (and have fun drinks while doing it) which comes in handy when you work for yourself, and don't have a boss to crack the whip when things need to get done. But now we live thousands of miles apart and co-ordinating skype meetups is tough, so I made us some notepads. And now I'm sharing them with all of the lovely peeps who need a little help remembering all the shit that needs to get done :)

This listing is for 1 notepad with 50 lined sheets made of 100% recycled papers and measures 4.25 x 5.5 inches.

name: Don't Grow Up Birthday card
description:
Seriously. The Good Times that are the sandbox in kindergarten are SO over.....

This listing is for 1 card
Size: 4.5" x 5.5" + white envelope
Printed on bright white 100lb FSC cardstock

name: The BFF card
description:
When it comes to friendships, it's quality over quantity. I hope you all have a BFF that you can count on in the good times and to back you up in the bad times. Now, as for the story behind this particular card... well what happens in your youth, stays in your youth ;)

(to note... this card is all in good FUN, thunderpeep does not condone violence against anyone;)

This listing is for 1 card+ white envelope
Size: 4.5" x 5.5"
Printed on beautiful bright white 100lb Forest Stewardship Certified cardstock
